Sentencas: Development of low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is crucially important for their stable and continuous operation as a reliable power source.
Titulo: Effect of anode calcination on the performance and redox stability of low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells prepared via impregnation

Sentencas: With Ni nanoparticles impregnated into the thick anode support, Sr- and Mg- doped LaGaO3 (LSGM) based electrolyte has been demonstrated to be adept at reducing the ohmic resistance for high performance at low temperatures (450-650 degrees C).
Titulo: Effect of anode calcination on the performance and redox stability of low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells prepared via impregnation

Sentencas: In this study, 55- m LSGM-electrolyte-based SOFCs are prepared via the impregnation for both cathode and anode, and high performance is obtained at low temperatures.
Titulo: Effect of anode calcination on the performance and redox stability of low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells prepared via impregnation

Sentencas: The durability and reduction-oxidation (redox) stability are examined in terms of the calcination temperature of LSGM/Ni(O) anode that determines the thermal growth of NiO crystals and interfacial reaction between NiO and LSGM.
Titulo: Effect of anode calcination on the performance and redox stability of low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells prepared via impregnation

Sentencas: We find that the cell with anode calcined at 1100 degrees C does contain larger NiO grains and more secondary phases, but it shows similar power density comparing to the one calcined at 800 degrees C. Both cells are stable at 650 degrees C and no damage on the electrolyte is found during the redox cycle, but the performance of the former is more sensitive to the redox cycle due to the high ohmic resistance arisen from the possible discontinuous connection between the large Ni grains.
Titulo: Effect of anode calcination on the performance and redox stability of low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells prepared via impregnation
